video.title: American Restoration: Collection
video.synopsis: Artist and restoration expert Rick Dale works with his family members and quirky employees to rejuvenate antique pieces that have lost their luster.

episodes.synopsis: Rick and his team restore an early 1900s strength-testing punching bag game; the crew faces a tight deadline to fix up an antique railroad strongbox.
episodes.title: Knockout

episodes.synopsis: When an antique railroad vacuum, used to clean train carriages, rolls into the shop, the team tries to service the colossal cleaning contraption.
episodes.title: Suck Up

episodes.synopsis: Rick and his crew get their feet wet when a 1952 powerboat ride splashes into the shop; Rick restores a 1940s child's tricycle for a Las Vegas museum.
episodes.title: Anchors Away

episodes.synopsis: Rick rebuilds a turn-of-the-century horse-drawn delivery wagon; Kelly convinces the manliest crew in Las Vegas to restore a 1940s Kotex dispenser.
episodes.title: Wheel & Deal

episodes.synopsis: While cruising historic Route 66, Rick and Ron find a 1950s Wurlitzer jukebox; Tyler is challenged to restore a 1940s chocolate bar vending machine.
episodes.title: Ridin' Route 66

episodes.synopsis: Rick and the guys aim to please when an 1800s cannon rolls into the shop; a client brings in a 1960s slot machine from an old Las Vegas casino.
episodes.title: The Big Bang

episodes.synopsis: The heat is on for Rick and his crew when they restore a 1960s popcorn machine; a client brings in an antique Michelin Man air compressor.
episodes.title: Hot & Salty

episodes.synopsis: The clock is running for Rick and his crew when they attempt to fix a vintage meter from a taxi, trying to bring the 1950s relic up to speed.
episodes.title: Sticky Fingers

episodes.synopsis: Rick grapples with a client's 1950s arm wrestling game; Kelly assumes a bigger role at the shop as the crew restores a washing machine from the 1930s.
episodes.title: Strong Arm

episodes.synopsis: Expectations are high when a client pays $10,000 to restore an early 1900s peanut roaster; Ron and Tyler find a cache of antique gas pumps and signs.
episodes.title: Nut Job

episodes.synopsis: An antique horse-drawn sleigh requires a holiday overhaul; Rick gets a "knockout" Christmas gift; Big Mike's 1930s Dixie Cup dispenser needs a part.
episodes.title: One Horse Open Sleigh

episodes.synopsis: A beat-up '50s Bevador beverage cooler needs fixing; Rick must solve the puzzle of a rare 1940s Rexair vacuum/air filter that arrives in pieces.
episodes.title: Vacuum Daze

episodes.synopsis: Rick visits an eccentric former client for clues to the mysteries of a 1937 iron lung he wants to restore; a prank war erupts between Ron and Tyler.
episodes.title: American Respiration

episodes.synopsis: Rick swings for the fences to turn a vintage 1950s Coke cooler into an L.A. Dodgers-inspired hot dog cart that he'll present to three baseball greats.
episodes.title: Dodger Doggin' It

episodes.synopsis: Rick transforms a 1950s Cushman ice cream cart; Leonard, the new picker, embarks on his first treasure-hunting trip with Ron.
episodes.title: Ameri-cone Dream
